title: Amdo TIbetan and Qinghai Dialect Chinese Language Resources
description:
A collection of books, academic articles, audio and video on/in Amdo Tibetan language and Qinghai dialect Chinese.

This torrent includes audio for the two main Amdo Tibetan language textbooks ("Colloquial Amdo Tibetan" and "Modern Oral Amdo").
